title: The Hollow Council
description: The Warden Council convenes an emergency session at the Zenith Spire. You must present your findings, but a trap is waiting.

turns.narrative: As you present your evidence to the Council, the doors lock. The Warden-General stands up, drawing his blade. He was the true orchestrator of the Silken Hand.
turns.choice_a: Call for the royal guards to arrest him
turns.consequence_a: Half the guards draw weapons on you; they belong to him. A massive melee begins.
turns.consequence_b: You challenge him to a duel of honor. His guards stand down temporarily.

turns.narrative: The Warden-General is a master swordsman equipped with pre-Scourge kinetic armor.
turns.consequence_a: An exhausting fight. You shatter his armor through sheer attrition and strike him down.
turns.choice_b: Use environmental hazards (The Spire's glass windows)
turns.consequence_b: You shatter the window behind him, using the vacuum of the high altitude winds to drag him out to his death.

general_defeated_melee.description: You and the loyal guards killed the traitor in a bloody brawl.

general_thrown_out.description: You threw the traitor from the Zenith Spire.

conclusion: You and the loyal guards killed the traitor in a bloody brawl.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
